thread.title: NFL injury report, week 5: Status updates for Andrew Luck, Karlos Williams, Alshon Jeffery, more
thread.title_full: NFL injury report, week 5: Status updates for Andrew Luck, Karlos Williams, Alshon Jeffery, more | syracuse.com

author: Hank Domin | hdomin@syracuse.com
title: NFL injury report, week 5: Status updates for Andrew Luck, Karlos Williams, Alshon Jeffery, more
text:
The updated National Football League injury report, as provided by the league, was released on Wednesday.
Injuries of note Thursday
COLTS: QUESTIONABLE: QB Matt Hasselbeck (illness), QB Andrew Luck (right shoulder).
TEXANS: OUT: WR Cecil Shorts III (shoulder), WR Nate Washington (hamstring).
Sunday
BEARS: DNP: WR Eddie Royal (ankle). LIMITED: QB Jay Cutler (hamstring), WR Alshon Jeffery (hamstring),
BENGALS: LIMITED: RB Jeremy Hill (knee).
BILLS: DNP: WR Percy Harvin (hip), RB LeSean McCoy (hamstring), WR Sammy Watkins (calf), RB Karlos Williams (concussion).
BROWNS: LIMITED: RB Robert Turbin (ankle).
BUCCANEERS: DNP: TE Austin Seferian-Jenkins (shoulder), WR Russell Shepard (hamstring). LIMITED: TE Luke Stocker (hip).
CARDINALS: DNP: TE Darren Fells (hip), WR J.J. Nelson (shoulder). LIMITED: RB Andre Ellington (knee).
CHIEFS: LIMITED: WR Albert Wilson (shoulder).
COWBOYS: DNP: WR Dez Bryant (foot).
FALCONS: LIMITED: RB Tevin Coleman (ribs), WR Leonard Hankerson (thumb), WR Julio Jones (toe, hamstring).
GIANTS: DNP: WR Victor Cruz (calf).
JAGUARS: DNP: WR Allen Hurns (ankle, thigh), WR Marqise Lee (hamstring), TE Marcedes Lewis (hamstring), RB Denard Robinson (knee). LIMITED: TE Julius Thomas (hand).
LIONS: DNP: RB Joique Bell (ankle), TE Eric Ebron (knee). LIMITED: TE Brandon Pettigrew (hamstring).
PACKERS: DNP: WR Davante Adams (ankle). LIMITED: WR Randall Cobb (shoulder), WR James Jones (hamstring).
RAVENS: DNP: TE Crockett Gillmore (calf), WR Breshad Perriman (knee), WR Steve Smith Sr. (back), RB Lorenzo Taliaferro (foot).
SAINTS: LIMITED: WR Brandin Cooks (ankle).
WASHINGTON: DNP: TE Jordan Reed (concussion, knee, ankle). LIMITED: WR DeSean Jackson (hamstring).
Complete injury report
Thursday
INDIANAPOLIS COLTS at HOUSTON TEXANS — COLTS: OUT: LB Jerrell Freeman (groin), RB Tyler Varga (concussion), LB Bjoern Werner (hamstring). QUESTIONABLE: S Mike Adams (neck), DE Henry Anderson (foot), CB Vontae Davis (foot), QB Matt Hasselbeck (illness), QB Andrew Luck (right shoulder). PROBABLE: TE Dwayne Allen (ankle), RB Frank Gore (foot), DE Kendall Langford (back), CB Greg Toler (neck). TEXANS: OUT: S Quintin Demps (hamstring), LB Akeem Dent (hamstring), RB Jonathan Grimes (hamstring), WR Cecil Shorts III (shoulder), WR Nate Washington (hamstring). QUESTIONABLE: S Lonnie Ballentine (knee), LB Whitney Mercilus (thigh), RB Chris Polk (knee). PROBABLE: T Duane Brown (hand), LB Max Bullough (shoulder), LB Jadeveon Clowney (shoulder, knee), LB Brian Cushing (groin), RB Arian Foster (groin), CB Johnathan Joseph (hip), QB Ryan Mallett (chest), T Derek Newton (ankle), S Eddie Pleasant (thigh), G Xavier Su'a-Filo (calf), NT Vince Wilfork (ankle).
Sunday
CHICAGO BEARS at KANSAS CITY CHIEFS — BEARS: DNP: T Jermon Bushrod (concussion, shoulder), CB Sherrick McManis (hamstring), G Patrick Omameh (ankle), S Antrel Rolle (ankle), WR Eddie Royal (ankle). LIMITED: CB Alan Ball (groin), QB Jay Cutler (hamstring), WR Alshon Jeffery (hamstring), G Kyle Long (back, ankle), LB Shea McClellin (elbow), P Patrick O'Donnell (knee), DT Jeremiah Ratliff (ankle), DT Will Sutton (elbow). CHIEFS: DNP: LB Josh Mauga (groin, Achilles). LIMITED: WR Albert Wilson (shoulder). FULL: TE Travis Kelce (groin, thumb), TE James O'Shaughnessy (hand).
SEATTLE SEAHAWKS at CINCINNATI BENGALS — SEAHAWKS: No data reported BENGALS: DNP: DE Wallace Gilberry (calf), CB Adam Jones (groin), T Andrew Whitworth (not injury related). LIMITED: CB Leon Hall (not injury related), RB Jeremy Hill (knee), S George Iloka (ankle), S Reggie Nelson (hamstring).
WASHINGTON REDSKINS at ATLANTA FALCONS — REDSKINS: DNP: CB Chris Culliver (knee), CB DeAngelo Hall (toe), TE Jordan Reed (concussion, knee, ankle). LIMITED: WR DeSean Jackson (hamstring), LB Perry Riley Jr. (calf). FULL: WR Pierre Garcon (knee), DE Kedric Golston (hand), LB Ryan Kerrigan (hip), C Josh LeRibeus (calf), C Kory Lichtensteiger (finger), G Spencer Long (ankle), LB Trent Murphy (hip). FALCONS: DNP: LB Justin Durant (elbow), WR Roddy White (not injury related). LIMITED: S Ricardo Allen (knee), RB Tevin Coleman (ribs), WR Leonard Hankerson (thumb), WR Julio Jones (toe, hamstring), LB Brooks Reed (groin). FULL: TE Jacob Tamme (concussion).
JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS at TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS — JAGUARS: DNP: DE Chris Clemons (knee), WR Allen Hurns (ankle, thigh), WR Marqise Lee (hamstring), TE Marcedes Lewis (hamstring), LB John Lotulelei (concussion), LB Paul Posluszny (ankle), RB Denard Robinson (knee), S James Sample (shoulder). LIMITED: S Sergio Brown (calf), CB Aaron Colvin (shoulder), DT Sen'Derrick Marks (knee), TE Julius Thomas (hand). BUCCANEERS: DNP: CB Johnthan Banks (knee), TE Austin Seferian-Jenkins (shoulder), WR Russell Shepard (hamstring), C Evan Smith (ankle). LIMITED: DT Gerald McCoy (shoulder), TE Luke Stocker (hip). FULL: S Major Wright (abdomen).
NEW ORLEANS SAINTS at PHILADELPHIA EAGLES — SAINTS: DNP: T Terron Armstead (knee), WR Marques Colston (not injury related), P Thomas Morstead (right quadricep), DT Kevin Williams (not injury related). LIMITED: S Jairus Byrd (knee), WR Brandin Cooks (ankle), G Jahri Evans (knee), CB Keenan Lewis (hip). EAGLES: DNP: LB Kiko Alonso (knee), DE Brandon Bair (groin), LB Mychal Kendricks (hamstring), CB Byron Maxwell (quadriceps), T Jason Peters (quadriceps). LIMITED: T Lane Johnson (knee). FULL: G Allen Barbre (groin), DE Taylor Hart (shoulder), S Chris Maragos (quariceps), DE Cedric Thornton (hand).
CLEVELAND BROWNS at BALTIMORE RAVENS — BROWNS: DNP: RB Shaun Draughn (back), S Tashaun Gipson (ankle), LB Craig Robertson (ankle), DT Randy Starks (not injury related), T Joe Thomas (not injury related), S Donte Whitner (illness). LIMITED: DE Desmond Bryant (shoulder), LB Karlos Dansby (ankle), CB Joe Haden (finger, ribs), LB Scott Solomon (ankle), RB Robert Turbin (ankle), CB K'Waun Williams (concussion). FULL: S Johnson Bademosi (elbow), RB Duke Johnson Jr. (ankle), QB Johnny Manziel (right elbow), T Mitchell Schwartz (thumb). RAVENS: DNP: DE Chris Canty (calf), TE Crockett Gillmore (calf), WR Breshad Perriman (knee), WR Steve Smith Sr. (back), RB Lorenzo Taliaferro (foot). LIMITED: G Marshal Yanda (ankle). FULL: T Eugene Monroe (concussion).
ST. LOUIS RAMS at GREEN BAY PACKERS — RAMS: DNP: S Maurice Alexander (groin), LB Alec Ogletree (ankle). FULL: RB Chase Reynolds (knee), DE Eugene Sims (knee). PACKERS: DNP: WR Davante Adams (ankle), S Morgan Burnett (calf), LB Jake Ryan (hamstring). LIMITED: T Bryan Bulaga (knee), WR Randall Cobb (shoulder), CB Demetri Goodson (hamstring), WR James Jones (hamstring). FULL: LB Jayrone Elliott (quadriceps), LB Clay Matthews (quadriceps).
BUFFALO BILLS at TENNESSEE TITANS — BILLS: DNP: WR Percy Harvin (hip), RB LeSean McCoy (hamstring), S Bacarri Rambo (quadriceps), WR Sammy Watkins (calf), RB Karlos Williams (concussion), DT Kyle Williams (calf). LIMITED: T Cordy Glenn (ankle), WR Marquise Goodwin (ribs), S Corey Graham (shoulder), WR Chris Hogan (hamstring), G John Miller (groin), S Aaron Williams (neck). TITANS: DNP: LB Wesley Woodyard (not injury related). LIMITED: NT Sammie Hill (knee), G Chance Warmack (knee). FULL: CB Jason McCourty (groin), CB Cody Riggs (knee).
ARIZONA CARDINALS at DETROIT LIONS — CARDINALS: DNP: TE Darren Fells (hip), WR J.J. Nelson (shoulder). LIMITED: CB Justin Bethel (foot), S Chris Clemons (hamstring), RB Andre Ellington (knee), LB Alani Fua (hamstring), S Rashad Johnson (hip), DT Frostee Rucker (thigh), LB LaMarr Woodley (thigh). LIONS: DNP: RB Joique Bell (ankle), TE Eric Ebron (knee), LB Travis Lewis (ankle), DT Haloti Ngata (calf). LIMITED: DE Ezekiel Ansah (shoulder), S James Ihedigbo (quadriceps), P Sam Martin (left knee), CB Rashean Mathis (calf), TE Brandon Pettigrew (hamstring), G Larry Warford (ankle). FULL: LB DeAndre Levy (hip), WR Lance Moore (ankle), T Corey Robinson (ankle).
NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS at DALLAS COWBOYS — PATRIOTS: LIMITED: CB Tarell Brown (foot), DE Trey Flowers (knee, shoulder). FULL: C Ryan Wendell (illness). COWBOYS: DNP: WR Dez Bryant (foot), WR Brice Butler (hamstring), DE Randy Gregory (ankle), TE James Hanna (ankle), LB Sean Lee (concussion). FULL: LB Andrew Gachkar (foot), DE Ryan Russell (groin).
DENVER BRONCOS at OAKLAND RAIDERS: No data reported
SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS at NEW YORK GIANTS — 49ERS: No data reported GIANTS: DNP: DE Robert Ayers Jr. (hamstring), S Landon Collins (calf), WR Victor Cruz (calf), CB Jayron Hosley (concussion), LB Devon Kennard (hamstring), CB Trumrine McBride (groin), DE George Selvie (calf). LIMITED: TE Jerome Cunningham (knee).
Monday
PITTSBURGH STEELERS at SAN DIEGO CHARGERS: No data reported
